## Link type

Base class for links to Identifiable Objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Link = {
    $type?: string;
    IdRef: string;
    Title?: string;
    Description?: string;
    TargetStatus?: LinkTargetStatus;
};
```

**References:** [LinkTargetStatus](./open-api-client.linktargetstatus.md)
